A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Most people's complaints were frankly quite odd. They complained about Leia using the force (when she is\, in fact\, quite good with the force in canon and even becomes an actual jedi in the books) or about the connection between Kylo and Rey (another canon thing - a force bond.)

Like... sure\, there a few scenes that were weird\, some plot holes. and some unnecessary moments\, but it was pretty damn good overall.

Bold and innovative.
